welcome.title: The power of⚡ bitcoin ⚡in your browser

send.title: Send in One Click
send.description: Lightning transactions happen all in your browser. No alt+tab or QR-code scanning needed.

paywall.title: No more annoying paywalls
paywall.description: Define individual budgets for websites to enable seamless payment streams. No more annoying paywalls.

privacy.title: Privacy first
privacy.description: Use lightning to authenticate and control your privacy.

foss.title: Free and Open Source
foss.description: Completely open code that can be audited by anyone. No stats or trackers. You are in control.

set_password.title: Set an unlock password
set_password.description: Your Lightning account data is securely encrypted with an unlock password. Do not forget this password! You need it to unlock the Alby Extension (in this browser)

confirm_password.label: Let's confirm you typed it correct:

test_connection.contact_support: If you need help please contact support@getalby.com

actions.delete_edit_account: Delete invalid account and edit again

title.welcome: Do you have a lightning wallet?

errors.connection_failed: Connection failed. Are your LND credentials correct?

page.title: Connect to LNDHub (BlueWallet)
page.description: In BlueWallet, choose the wallet you want to connect, open it, click on "...", click on Export/Backup to display the QR code and scan it with your webcam.

page.instructions: Navigate to your BTCPayServer and log in as an admin. Go to Server Settings > Services > LND Rest - See information. Then Click "See QR Code information" and copy the QR Code data. Paste it below:

default_view.no_transactions: No transactions made with Alby, yet.

export.title: Export Account
export.tip_mobile: Tip: Use this wallet with your mobile device
export.scan_qr: Import this wallet into Zeus or BlueWallet by scanning the QRCode.

remove.confirm:
Are you sure you want to remove account: {{name}}? 
This can not be undone. If you used this account to login to websites you might lose access to those.

unlock_error.help: Your account data is encrypted with your unlock password. If you really forgot your unlock password you have to reset and add your Lightning account again.
unlock_error.link: Reset now and add a new account

website_enhancements.title: Website enhancements
website_enhancements.subtitle: Tipping enhancements for Twitter, YouTube, etc.

lnurl_auth.title: LNURL-Auth
lnurl_auth.hint:
is a generic authentication protocol. It authenticates the user using digital signatures. The protocol does not require any other identifying information such as passwords, emails, usernames, or similar. With Alby you can use your lightning accounts to securely login to websites.
To be compatible with other wallets we had to make a few changes that you can configure here.
Ideally all those options are OFF. Use them only if you have old accounts.

legacy_lnurl_auth_202207.title: Legacy LNURL-Auth
legacy_lnurl_auth_202207.subtitle: The key generation for LNURL-auth has changed (July 2022). Alby was not compatible with other implementations. This was changed, but now different login keys are used. If you used LNURL-auth to login before you can still enable the old method. This option will be removed later, make sure to switch to the new login.

legacy_lnurl_auth.title: Legacy signing for LNDhub and LNBits
legacy_lnurl_auth.subtitle: Message signing and login with LNDhub (e.g. BlueWallet) and LNbits accounts has been changed (March 2022). If you logged in with these accounts you can still enable the old signing method. This option will be removed later, make sure to switch to the new login.

language.title: Language

personal_data.title: Personal data
personal_data.description: Payees can request for additional data to be sent with a payment. This data is not shared with anyone without your consent, you will always be prompted before this data is sent along with a payment.
